data.name: Hammer of Virtue Demo
data.detailed_description:
A small group of terrorist called Scientific Freedom have been setting up force fields around the planet. The Unified Realm has assigned you to a hammer and the only indestructible armor in our possession to stop the threat. Use your combat skills to face various animals and robots controlled by the evil scientist.

Smash the environment with your hammer and hit the pieces against the foes or use your attack and blocking skills to fight them off. Deliberate combat were you have to study the enemies movements to win or just raise a building on top of them. The wicked scientists are controlling numerous beasts and over 40 levels to stop us from finding out their evil plans. You and only your (or the person who will wear the indestructible armor after you) is our only hope.

Features

  • Fully destructible environments.
  • Emergent game-play with interactive environments.
  • Deliberate combat. Read the enemy and act accordingly.
  • Large Bestiary and over 40 levels (3 levels in Demo).
  • Skill based combat. No character progression and no loot.
